<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\Returns the Use edge that corresponds to \\p OpIdx.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Note: This is the default implementation that works for instructions that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// match the underlying LLVM instruction. All others should use a different</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// implementation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/use">Use</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/user/#a8014de6610ee432b675e3819e011acb2">getOperandUseDefault</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OpIdx, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcctrloopsverify-cpp/#a345bd69760b9ee32b3f49d4fc04120fb">Verify</a>) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\Returns the Use for the \\p OpIdx&#39;th operand. This is virtual to allow</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// instructions to deviate from the LLVM IR operands, which is a requirement</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// for sandboxir Instructions that consist of more than one LLVM Instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/user/#aa469c4f23b78900ac9135b3417819f31"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value/#a7b479862be57f4448b155a225b5972ac">Use</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/user/#aa469c4f23b78900ac9135b3417819f31">getOperandUseInternal</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OpIdx, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcctrloopsverify-cpp/#a345bd69760b9ee32b3f49d4fc04120fb">Verify</a>) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/user/#a1a834efd0135e81675280d5ba828d263"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">friend</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/user/#a1a834efd0135e81675280d5ba828d263">OperandUseIterator</a>; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for getOperandUseInternal()</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The default implementation works only for single-LLVMIR-instruction</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Users and only if they match exactly the LLVM instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/user/#a2a0e1f0647903c551dc3ea6333ab6fc3"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/user/#a2a0e1f0647903c551dc3ea6333ab6fc3">getUseOperandNoDefault</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value/#a7b479862be57f4448b155a225b5972ac">Use</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value/#a7b479862be57f4448b155a225b5972ac">Use</a>)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value/#a7b479862be57f4448b155a225b5972ac">Use</a>.LLVMUse-&gt;getOperandNo();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
